strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.description: The legitimate successor of a ninja clan who accepted orders from his master to carry out assassinations and infiltrations. Hayate took many pupils under his wing while working for the same master his family had loyally served for generations. After some time he apparently left in search of his younger sister, a ninja herself who had fled their home under mysterious circumstances. No records remain of what became of the two thereafter.
strings.fusion:
You grant me new power?
I shall repay this favor in kind.
strings.summon:
I shall do my master's bidding,
no matter what is asked of me.
That is the way of the ninja.

strings.evolution:
Had I had this power
back when I was innocent...
I wouldn't have lost what I lost.
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.description: A man who once led a clan of ninjas. His life ended with him still regretting having driven his younger sister Miyuki to pursue darkness out of jealousy for her talents. His appearance as a vision this time is like a reincarnation, and he seems to hope he can use his power to make things up to his younger sister.
strings.fusion:
I shall repay your hospitality
with hard work.
strings.summon:
To my master who gave me the
power I never had before...
I shall now repay my debt.

strings.evolution:
I have been granted power anew.
I vow upon my blade
to serve my master with my life.
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.description: A ninja who committed political assassinations and gathered intelligence on foes in the name of his master. Born to a samurai mother, his younger sister was a ninja like himself. However, she was driven from their home by the coldness he showed her, and sought the power of darkness. To take responsibility for this turn of events, their mother honorably and tragically took her own life. Hayate gave his remaining years to his master, but now, as a vision, he wanders the world in search of his sister, in hopes that he might still make amends.
strings.fusion:
Hmmm... You truly honor me.
If you would see me grow stronger,
your will shall be done.
strings.summon:
That I have returned
to this world is a gift from my master.
I shall see the debt is paid.

strings.evolution:
The way of the ninja requires
constant devotion to one's training...
I live only for my master...
strings.affinity:
Our journey together has
been a long one, has it not?
This may be but a trifle,
but please accept it.
strings.description: A legitimate heir of the arts of the ninja, and a peerless assassin and spy. Hayate's mother was a katana-wielding samurai of grave demeanor, a personality he inherited. The envy he harbored against his younger sister, an expert swordswoman adept with dual blades, gradually drove her toward the darkness, eventually causing her to flee their master's domain.
strings.fusion:
Master. I shall not squander
the precious power
you bestow on me.
strings.summon:
Our encounter shows that you
are fated to be my new master.
From this day, I shall be your shadow.
